results.title: [Changes in diastolic filling of the heart during isometric exercise test in patients with ischemic heart disease treated with atenolol].
results.text_hl: [Changes in diastolic filling of the heart during isometric exercise test in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Myocardial_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D017202 @@@ischemic heart disease@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@].

results.title: [Effect of the long-term atenolol therapy on the structural and functional parameters of the left ventricle in patients with dilated cardiomyopathy].
results.text_hl: Six-months treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ improved the clinical status and reduced the degree of @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated_with_Left_Ventricular_Noncompaction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565277 @@@LV dilatation@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Shock @DISEASE_MESH:D012769 @@@circulatory insufficiency@@@ of @DISEASE_Conversion_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003291 @@@functional@@@ classes I and II.

citations.NLM: Sisakian AS. [Effect of the long-term atenolol therapy on the structural and functional parameters of the left ventricle in patients with dilated cardiomyopathy]. Eksp Klin Farmakol. 1997 Nov-Dec;60(6):17-20. PMID: 9460590
